skills can be old news in just a couple of years. This panel brings together Black tech leaders who understand how to manage information overload, adapt to change, and strategically upskill themselves and their teams. Learn how these leaders identify trends early, build expertise in key areas, and position themselves as early adopters for new technology. Discover how to continuously adapt without overstretching and develop the skills to lead teams through cycles of change. [/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]
